name: Alfer Funeral
description:
Alfer Funeral is an fan game based on the series "Alfred's Playhouse" and several other works by Emily Yuocis adapted to a Space Funeral game. Alfred and Dictator Pickles find themselves back at the playhouse for reasons uknown. D. Pickles suspects it must be the work of Labby, now both of you must explore the playhouse and find who go you there in the first place.

The game is not finished yet, it is still lacking the mystery command and a few more things that will be added, it can be played from start to finish, no credits yet.
